content.query:
DROP TABLE [metadata].[audit_pipeline_run]
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE TABLE [metadata].[audit_pipeline_run]
( 
	[id] [bigint]  NOT NULL,
	[pipeline_run_id] [varchar](40)  NOT NULL,
	[pipeline_master_run_id] [varchar](40)  NOT NULL,
	[pipeline_name] [varchar](255)  NOT NULL,
	[pipeline_status] [varchar](40)  NOT NULL,
	[pipeline_entry_count] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[pipeline_start_datetime] [datetime]  NOT NULL,
	[pipeline_end_datetime] [datetime]  NULL,
	[md_insert_datetime] [datetime]  NOT NULL,
	[md_insert_user] [varchar](40)  NOT NULL,
	[md_update_datetime] [datetime]  NOT NULL,
	[md_update_user] [varchar](40)  NOT NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
